item.title: Cybersecurity : Recent events
item.description: Covid-19 : Effects on cyber crimes: While following a recent news thread, I read about how the Covid-19 breakout is affecting the cybersecurity domain.

item.title: Amazon web services : Containers and Fargate
item.description: Introduction In the cloud arena, Container technology is growing tremendously after the release of Docker back in 2013.
